newsitem.title: USA: Spa Faucet reports higher net, revs.
newsitem.headline: Spa Faucet reports higher net, revs.

text.p: Spa Faucet Inc Friday said revenues for the six months ended November 30, 1996, rose $7.4 million from $3.6 million.
Net income for the six months rose to $418,000 or $0.03 a share compared to $7,000 or less than $0.01 a share for the six months ended November 30, 1995.

Net income for the second quarter ended November 30, 1996, was inclusive of adjustments for several non-recurring charges and expenses during the period, including charges related to revenues that were posted in the first quarter.
"Based on our current order backlog and anticipated growth from our existing customer base as well as expansion into new areas, we expect to continue to grow at a record pace," the company said.
